dempred.featuregeneration

Class FeatureSquarer<T extends Datapoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.featuregeneration.FeatureSquarer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureGeneratorInterface<T>, java.io.Serializable

    public class FeatureSquarer<T extends Datapoint>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureGeneratorInterface<T>, java.io.Serializable
    The feature generator is used to square all features of another feature generator. If a feature generator featGenX generates features like: f1, f2, f3 then this squarer will generate features like: f1*f2, f1*f3,f2*f3,f1,f2,f3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Instantiates a new feature squarer using a feature generator.
